sentences.sentence: On Meredith's new recording, Eddie Higgins accompanies her on all but one song.
sentences.translation: 在梅瑞迪斯的新唱片中，艾迪·希金斯为她伴奏了除一首歌以外的所有歌曲。

sentences.sentence: An illustrated catalogue accompanies the exhibition.
In special cases, a husband can deduct the travel expenses of his wife who accompanies him on a business trip.
sentences.translation: 在特殊情况下，丈夫可以扣除差旅中随行妻子的旅费。
